packageJSON.name: translationstudio
packageJSON.description: A utility for translating the Bible and biblical content into any language.

releases.body: See [Release Notes](http://help.door43.org/en/knowledgebase/9-translationstudio/docs/8-what-s-new-with-translationstudio-version-11)

releases.name: v10.1
releases.body: This release _only_ introduces updated source content.

releases.name: v10
releases.body:
Release 10: Stability/Usability
- Introducing Merge conflict UI in Desktop.
- Adding Sorting of Projects in Desktop.
- Improved Print Layout and Options in Desktop.
- Addressed minor bugs and issues.

releases.name: v9.2
releases.body:
# Fixes
- fixed data loss when using up or down arrows to navigate in a chunk
- improved error messages displayed to user when trying to upload a translation without an internet connection
- fixed dialog boxes that were not working correctly
- fixed completing chunk in notes or questions translation when there has been no translation
- removed extra blank pages at end of exported pdf

> NOTE: The Windows 32bit build is currently in beta.

releases.name: v9.1
releases.body:
- Mac version officially released.
- Scrolling issue introduced in 9.0 is addressed.
- Verse marker usability improvements, addresses word wrap issue.
- Confirming consent to the licensing agreement when adding a contributor.
- Improved completion progress to update properly now.

releases.name: v9.0
releases.body:
- Now allows users to change language name/code and project type of ULB, UDB and "regular". This unblocked naming collisions that prevented merging in the past.
  ​
- Custom fonts: Selecting custom fonts that are already installed as system fonts in the OS.
  ​
- Git bundled with Windows App to address some git bugs. Mac requires [manual installation of git](https://git-scm.com/download/mac). 
  ​
- Update languages list so that users don't have to wait for new release. Android already handles this.
  ​
- Addressed user issue of missing/losing data in random occurrences. This did introduce a slight scrolling issue that will be addressed soon.
  ​
- Formatting for RTL added to match Android.
  ​
- Restore from Door43 to overwrite instead of merge as with import, already available in Android.

releases.name: v8.1
releases.body:
## Hotfix

There was a bug in the API that was accidentally introduced to 8.0. This release corrects lots of issues in the source content that were found in 8.0

Anyone using v8.0 should update to 8.1 as soon as possible.

releases.name: v8.0
releases.body:
- USFM can now be imported into the app
- Translations can be imported from Door43
- Translations are now merge with duplicates ones when imported into the app
- Verse marker functionality is improved
- Translations can be backed up online to the translator's Door43 account
- Line breaks are preserved in the target translation
- After uploading to Door43 a link to your online repository is provided
- Footnotes are now displayed in the source text
- Numerous bug fixes

> NOTE: Release 8.0 is no longer available due to a database bug.  An 8.5 fix release will be available next week.

releases.name: v7.0
releases.body:
## Fixes
- Printing
- Export
- UI Fixes
- Refactored a lot of code
- Missing data bug

releases.name: v6.0
releases.body:
## New Features
- Translations are now published to the new git.door43.org server
- A loading dialog is displayed while backups are restored
- Printing is supported for Bible and OBS projects
- added a LICENSE file to translations
- compatibility updates for tS Android

## Bug Fixes
- App no longer freezes when restoring old backups
- App no longer freezes when starting up
- Translation list is refreshed when restoring/importing a backup
- External links in tA now open in the native browser
- tA images are now displayed
- many other bug fixes

releases.name: v5.0
releases.body:
## Features
- added tranlsationAcademy Volume 2
- updated to the latest source content and languages
- backups from android can now be restored into the desktop app (and vice versa)

## Fixes
- unable to see last book of Testaments
- project list was not scrollable
- translationWords were not sorted correctly
- dragging chunk done switch exited app
- luke was not loading
- missing dll error
- last chunk in book was getting lost
- cards jumped around when clicking tabs or buttons

releases.name: v4.1
releases.body:
This fixes a number of bugs including the following:
- Clicking links in tA translation no longer crash app
- The english source of Luke now works
- Fixes missing dll error
- Fixing missing tW index
- Fixes app crashing when dragging the chunk done switch
- Fixes tW translation not displaying
- Several other minor issues.

releases.name: v4.0
releases.body:
## Features
- New loading screen
- App starts a LOT faster
- No more dependencies or extra steps to install application (You don't need to install git anymore)
- Automatically backups translations to your home directory
- translationAcademy is now view-able within the app.
- support for translating translationAcademy
- added gateway language mode (disabled by default) to allow translating ULB, UDB, translationAcademy, and more.
- added double spacing support to printing

## Fixes
- Issues with printing OBS with images
- jittery cards when clicking on tabs or editing.
- lots of other bug fixes.

- Updated ui
- Fixed bugs in publishing
- Added support for exporting Bible projects
- Added user settings
- Added basic support for printing with images
- Added Gateway Language translation mode
- Fixed numerous bugs
- Fixed bug preventing the feedback dialog from working

## New Features
- OBS projects can be exported as PDF
- support for translating translationNotes
- support for translating translationQuestions
- support for translating translationWords
- support for translating Bible projects into ULB or UDB
- translations can be manually backed up

## Bug fixes

Lots of bug fixes!

> NOTE: tagged this incorrectly. This is actually 2.0

releases.name: 1.0.0-beta.3
releases.body:
## HOTFIX

The app was previously incorrectly bundled with an ssh key. This caused publishing to fail because the ssh key did not match the device id. This fix includes both removing this bundled key and providing support for regenerating keys if for some reason they become invalid.

releases.name: 1.0.0-beta.2
releases.body:
## Fixes
- Publishing projects works now.
- lots of other bug fixes.

## Features
- Improved support for translation notes, questions, and words
- lots of ui improvements

releases.name: 1.0.0-beta.1
releases.body:
This release allows  you to start new translations, view resources, and publish your translations to unfoldingWord.

Follow the instructions at https://github.com/unfoldingWord-dev/ts-desktop/wiki/Installation-Instructions in order to correctly install it.

If you previously tried out one of the alpha releases you'll need to delete any translations you've started.

releases.name: 1.0.0-alpha.4
releases.body: Minor release with improvements to ui and data management.

releases.name: 1.0.0-alpha.3
releases.body:
- Speed improvements to the app
- Settings screen is now accessible (though not completely functional)
- Numerous other bug fixes and minor additions.

releases.name: 1.0.0-alpha.2
releases.body:
When trying out the app you may want to open up a smaller project such as `Jude` since the app is currently quite slow.

Also note: the application may take a while to boot up (some times close to 30 seconds on windows).

We currently do not have linux builds condensed into a single executable so you must extract the directory and execute the `translationStudio` file within.
